chunks.title: How to Participate in Community Raids
chunks.body: Complete guide for participating in community raids using NYLA's engagement features. Learn how to find, join, and contribute to community raids effectively.
chunks.summary_en: Step-by-step guide for joining and participating in community raids through NYLA's social engagement system.
chunks.summary_zh: 通过NYLA社交参与系统加入和参与社区突袭的分步指南。

steps.action: Open NYLAGo and click Raid tab
steps.details: Navigate to NYLAGo interface and select the 'Raid' tab to access community engagement features.
Browse the list of active community raids. Look for campaigns with high engagement and clear objectives.
Click on a raid that interests you. Read the description, goals, and participation requirements carefully.
Understand what the raid is trying to achieve: likes, retweets, comments, or specific engagement targets.
Confirm your participation by clicking the join button. This adds you to the raid participant list.

steps.action: Access target posts via three dots
steps.details: Click the three dots (⋯) button to get direct links to posts that need engagement from raid participants.
Like, retweet, and comment on the target posts. Provide meaningful engagement, not spam comments.
Monitor your engagement activity in the raid dashboard to see your contribution to the campaign goals.

pitfalls.solution: Always provide meaningful, relevant comments. Avoid generic responses like 'nice' or emoji-only comments.
Always use the three dots (⋯) feature to get correct target posts. Don't guess which posts to engage with.
Space out your engagement over time. Don't like/comment on everything at once.
Ask questions in the raid discussion or contact raid organizers for clarification before participating.
Vary your engagement patterns and always provide genuine interactions. Avoid repetitive behavior.

prerequisites: Active X.com account with good standing
Understanding of appropriate social media behavior
best_practices: Read raid objectives carefully before joining
Space out your activities to appear natural
Report any inappropriate raid objectives to moderators
rewards: Potential token rewards for successful raids
Increased visibility for your own content
